group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]…………

group_1.textRight: Mitama...I have a request...

group_1.textLeft: Don't talk...@You're bleeding badly...

group_1.textRight: I want you to tell the eastern Magical Girls that what happened to me has nothing to do with the west.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I know.@You fell into the enemy's trap.

group_1.textRight: No one placed expectations on me@to destroy it alone.
I would be dead if that were true.
However, Felicia overcame her despair@and saved me.
This is an event will restore trust.@So please, I want you to tell them.

group_1.textLeft: Leave it all to me.
This is the center of Kamihama's Magical Girl@network after all.

group_1.textRight: Of course, I needn't remind you, do I?
Although, it is difficult to truly be happy after having@survived like this...

group_1.textLeft: It is a great thing that Promised Blood's lifeline@was cut off,
but the price in doing so was too high...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I can still hear her...

group_1.textLeft: She really just disappeared without a trace...?

group_1.textRight: Don't make me keep saying it!@I saw it with my own eyes!
Ikumi used the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s power to kill the Witch@and vanished...
I saw it...with my own eyes...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: Iroha...Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...?

group_1.textRight: Honestly, I'm past my limit.@I want you to let me out of this fight.

group_1.textLeft: Hinano...

group_1.textRight: I've lost Ryou and now Ikumi...@What kind of a leader am I...?
I don't feel like I can stand above anyone@and lead them anymore.
I'm sorry I'm so weak...
I really want to be here to help...but...@now I just can't anymore...!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textRight: I don't even know what to say to her...
She's left us with a lot of mysteries,@but we'll talk to her again later...

group_1.textLeft: I have sent the others back home.
Uh, umm...what is this...?@Did something happen here...?
If there's something you need to tell us,@you'd better say it first.
Because once you hear this,@I don't think you will be able to report it...

group_1.textRight: ...That alone is enough for me to make a guess.
*Sigh*...let's see...
No, I will just give you the report.
After the Witch in the offshoot Mirrors was defeated@earlier...

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: Alina and Karin disappeared...

group_1.textLeft: In the meantime, you should go bring your luggage
so we can continue our activities～

group_1.textRight: You say that, but I dunno how I'm gonna explain this@to my parents!

group_1.textLeft: As the president of Torayamachi,@I will try to support you.
That said, there are limits...
And our infiltration team has been severely@damaged...

group_1.textRight: Sakuya and Ranka...@Are they gonna be okay?

group_1.textLeft: Sakuya is alive, but she needs some time to detoxify,
and Ranka's taken a lot of damage herself.
That aside, are you fine, Juri?@Are you going to stay in Kamihama?

group_1.textRight: My old man's as wild as Juri the Great,@so it's fine doing some bad things once in a while.
Or, that's how I feel it'd go down,@but I ain't got a clue how he'd feel right now.

group_1.textLeft: In short, this is much like a war of attrition.

group_1.textRight: What's that?

group_1.textLeft: Our parents nor anyone else knows about@our situation,
since we've just been glossing over why we keep@coming to Kamihama, right～?
Now that our shortcut is gone, it's going to be hard@going back and forth.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, s'pose so.

group_1.textLeft: We don't have any support to cover the costs@between Kamihama and Futatsugi, since we're@suddenly in a pinch～
That's the gist of it.
It's not like we can all just live in Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: Well, this city's definitely got the strongest allies@with the Tokime village, don't they?
Man, this is rough.

group_1.textLeft: It's a little late to be realizing that only now.

group_1.textRight: …………[wait:0.8][chara:102401:lipSynch_1]@Hey Sis, I got another somethin' to tell ya.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: I met that Magius artist in Mirrors.
She was one hell of an irregularity.

group_1.textLeft: This is sudden, what was wrong with her...?

group_1.textCenter: Haah...this is harder than I thought...
I think healer might be a better role for me...

group_1.textRight: Huh? Ranka, are you okay...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm fine, I just got something in my eye.
More importantly, are you doing okay?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, totally!@All my problems have just poofed into thin air～

group_1.textLeft: ...No one around here's going to say it,@so I'll put it gently for you.

group_1.textRight: W-what...?

group_1.textLeft: Looking from the sidelines, you are seriously insane.
